author: stas
msg: In order to make Apache-Test compatible with the rest of Perl testing
frameworks, we no longer chdir into t/, but run from the root of the
project (where t/ resides). A test needing to know where it's running
from (e.g. to read/write files/dirs on the filesystem), should do that
relative to the serverroot, documentroot and other server

author: stas
msg: make the tests relocatable (not to rely on cwd)

author: stas
msg: chomp needs a defined value (with 1.3 this test fails)

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Begone evil tabs!  And revote on patch that allows \\ to work.
